legacy.full_text:
For the first time in history, the House has deposed its speaker.

Democrats joined with Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) and his small group of conservative allies to vote to strip Kevin McCarthy of his gavel.

https://t.co/zoi309H5x3 https://t.co/qLQBVoYuwY
